[[inst_hl_sdp]]
==== HL.SDP

*Syntax:* hl.sdp SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<3]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sdp.svg[HL.SDP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
